attributes.action: cease the treatment of drug users at the tax payers expense.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: cease the treatment of drug users by supplying them with heroin at nil cost to them,but at considerable cost to the tax payer (£645000 per annum),and use that money to supply that person on the news suffering from cancer whose daughter wrote a pleading letter to you recently.Or would he receive greater consideration should he inject some filthy substance-voluntarily?
